articles.title: Helen Skelton: Celebrity SAS star makes emotional plea after discovery brings her to tears - Express.co.uk
articles.description: HELEN SKELTON - a contestant on Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins- has taken to Instagram to make a plea to her fans about giving their grandparents love and support during lockdown, after she was left in tears during her shopping trip today.

articles.title: Dave Greenfield, keyboard player with the Stranglers – obituary - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: His intricate playing style, inspired by Rick Wakeman, took the band far beyond the three-chord thrash of punk rock
articles.content: On stage, Greenfields banked keyboards conjured images of the prog rock bands that punk was supposed to have swept away. Similarly unpunklike was the pentagram pendant he was often photographed wearing. It represented, he recalled, the relation between the se… [+780 chars]

articles.description: Cinemas across the UK could reopen this summer in time for Christopher Nolan's new film 'Tenet', which is sticking to its original release date
articles.content:
Cinemas could reopen across the UK by mid-July, according to Vue Cinemas chief executive Tim Richards.
